moves.1. e4:
My team captain suggested me to annotate some games,that is a good exercise.She suggested to annotate a lost game,to learn from my mistakes.But since this is my first annotation,I wanted to make a gift to myself,annotating a won game.Anyway I will learn a lot,since in this game made many mistakes,the worse one has been to miss a mate in 6!:(
My opponent is more or less at my level,so the game has been difficult to both,and one of the more long I played here in Gameknot.
I open as my usual.
moves.1... c6: He chose the Caro-Kann,likely not knowing that I was at that time playing a Mini Tournament with that opening,so that it was no so unfamiliar to me.
moves.2. d4 d5 3. e5: Here I could have played 3.Nc3,but preferred the advance variation.
moves.4. Nf3 e6 5. Be2 Nd7 6. O-O Ne7: we continued in the classical way
moves.7. Nbd2: Nh4 was better?I preferred to develop the other knight
moves.7... h6 8. c3: I didn't understand his last move,and thought to defend the d pawn,and at the same time to open a way to the Queen
moves.8... Bh7 9. b4: Advancing pawns has to be a good thing,or not?
moves.9... Qb6 10. a4: That Queen has to be stopped!
moves.10... a5 11. Nb3: open the way to my DL bishop
moves.13. cxb4: now I can capture the pawn
moves.13... g5: I don' t think that move was good,since he had to keep the castle
moves.14. Re1 Bg7 15. Bb2: Here I think there was a better move...but which one?Maybe Bb3?
moves.16. Nc5: Here the computer analysis says inaccuracy,better Rc1,and I think,also playable a quiet move,like h3.
moves.16... b6: Also for my opponent the computer analysis is not good,better Nxc5
moves.17. axb6 Nxb6 18. Na6 Rxa6: Here he gave a rook for a Knight
moves.19. Bxa6: I took the rook,it was better to do it by my rook?
moves.20... Be4: Also mistake for the computer,it was better g4
moves.21. Bxc4 Bxf3 22. gxf3: I think here it was better to capture by the Queen,even if strangely the computer didn't report mistake
moves.24... Rb8 25. Ra7 Qb6 26. Rea1: Here I can clearly see my mistake!Why I have not captured the Queen?
moves.26... Qxb4: He had here a good chance:26...Qxc5 27.dxc5 Rxb4 28.R1a2 Nf4 threatening Bxe5
moves.27... Qd2: Qb3 better,followed by 28.Qxc6 Qxf3 and the game was going to a draw I think
moves.28. Qd6 Rb3 29. Qd8+ Kh7 30. Rxf7 Nf4:
This has been a blunder,he didn't see that I could  mate in 6!
31. Rxg7+ Kxg7 32. Bf8+ Kg8 33. Bb4+ Kh7 34. Ra7+ Kg6 35. Qe8+ Kf5 36. Qf7#
moves.32... Qxd4 33. Qf5+: an useless check,I had to move the other rook in c1,if he had captured my bishop,I moved Rd7
moves.39. Bb2 Qxb2 40. Ra8+: Rd1 was so difficult to be found?:(
moves.43... c5: he advances his pawn,but was not better Kh7?
moves.46. h4: More easy 46 Qf5+ Kg7 47.Qe5+ Kg8 48.Qf6 threatening 49.e7
moves.49. f4 gxf4 50. Qxf4+ Kg6: His King continues to try something to safe
moves.58. Kg4: At this point of the game I was pretty sure to win
moves.61. Kf7 Qc4+:
Here he offered me a draw.
I knew that English sense of humor is very cold... :)
I declined it...

gameName: Beer and Pickles Cup Mini Tournament
